data.message: Thank you for all you do, the caring the giving, the listening, without judging. Homelessness is a big problem here in Vancouver, Washington. It tears at my heart because my son is homeless. I work in the downtown area and see it daily. I give, but need to give more. I always show respect for others, no judging. I don't know their story... Good for you!

replies.message: Thank you for sharing a bit of your story Denise.  We have a sister chapter, Homeless in Vancouver, that is doing amazing things locally.  Please give them a "like."
I will try and see if I can find their information. Thank you!
